resources.string: There is a problem parsing the package.

"%1$s wants to install other apps.
Allow this now and in the future?"
The application was not found in the list of installed applications.
MIUI will allow this app to start without your permission.

"The application you are installing will replace another application.
All previous user data will be saved."
"%1$s (%2$s) will replace the currently installed version (%3$s). User’s contents will be retained. Sure to install?"

"This is a system application. Do you still want to replace it?
All previous user data will be saved."
Do you want to install this application?
"This application is not compatible with this phone's CPU."
The package specified was deleted before installation could be completed.
An existing package by the same name with a conflicting signature is already installed.
The package appears to be corrupt.
%1$s could not be installed on this phone.
The package only works on newer versions of Android.
The package did not pass verification and cannot be installed.
A timeout occurred while trying to verify this package. Please try to install it again later.
%1$s could not be installed. Free up some space and try again.
This app will start up automatically
MIUI will not ask you to confirm any security or privacy related operations carried out by this app.
%1$s is part of the following application:
Do you want to uninstall the application?
Cannot uninstall: this package is an active device administrator.
"This app has been modified and can't be uninstalled in its current form."
The application will be replaced with the factory version.

"For security reasons, your phone has been set to forbid installing applications obtained from unofficial channels.To lift the ban you can install applications from any channel,but your phone and personal data may be attacked by applications of unknown sources,and you shall assume full responsibility for the probable consequences.
You may also modify it via Settings->Security->Unknown sources."
"This app poses a risk to your device's security."
